t: Amazon: brand value 2024 | Statista

t: Most valuable brands worldwide 2024 | Statista
s: In 2024, according to the source's ranking, Apple overtook Amazon's position as the most valuable brand in the world. The technology giant had an estimated brand value of about 516.6 billion U.S. dollars, while Amazon had 308.9 billion dollars worth.
